Articles.Content:
1.1 with a bunch of mods but I doubt they're guilty unless it's the underlying toolbar.

I have a three-screen computer, I was playing KSP on the main screen.  My rocket was drifting but I was in atmosphere so I didn't want to use warp, I let it fly and went over to the right screen to do other things.  All those icons along the right side would act as if I was hovering them when the Y coordinate matched but the X coordinate was way off the screen.

The screen to the right is a VMware virtual machine but I don't see how that should matter.  KSP does lose focus like it should in the situation so it shouldn't matter what got the focus.
